title: Where can I find the best free VST instruments for Studio One? - Quora

response.answer_text: Presuming you’re on Windows, you go to KVR Audio’s website and do this search. If you’re on a Mac, just amend the search parameters to change the OS.  It’s well worth while signing up with KVR, as there are sometimes offers and competitions, as well as weekly emails which can be helpful. I check KVR regularly, and I’ve just found 3 new free instruments while writing this, by checking ‘Newest’ instead of ‘Most Popular’!

Inside Studio One. It comes with some cool plugins if you own a Professional version. For extra free VSTi, check out the free stuff that most famous plugin developers provide. Try Native Instruments, u-he, etc. Also, do keep an eye on the Plugin Boutique store. They give a lot of free stuff every month. Hope this helps. PS: Do NOT crack software to use them for free. Support the industry.
